decision_conditions:
Condition 9 – Solar Panels Condition 11 – Accessible Parking Condition 12 – Electric Vehicle Charging Points Condition 13 – Antennae/Satellite Dish Condition 15 – Substation Safety Details relating to: Planning Approval 18-0210-FULOPDC for Hollybrook Ltd (Issue 1 – April 2020)
Condition 12 - Electrical Vehicle Charging Points (19168_PL_216 Rev A)
description: Details pursuant to conditions 9 (PV Panels), 11 (Accessible Parking), 12 (Electric Vehicle Charging Points), 13 (Antennae/ Satellite Dishes) and 15 (Substation Safety Details) of planning permission 18/0210/FULOPDC dated 23/07/2019 for Erection of two buildings between six, ten, twelve and fourteen storeys (min c. 20.1m and max. c. 46.1m above ground level) comprising 105 residential units and 280 sqm of commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1/A2/A3/A4/B1/D1/D2), public open space, accessible parking, cycle parking, landscaping and related ancillary works’ and planning permission 20/0042/VAROPDC dated 02 July 2020 for ‘Section 73 application to vary condition 7 (BREEAM) of planning permission 18/0210/FULOPDC
street_name: Land to the East of Victoria Care Centre
